Package model

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
model.GameMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameMap extends Object implements Serializable
Class that provides every method that is required for any properties of the Game Map
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Jay Bhatt, Madhav Anadkat, Bhargav Fofandi
